name: Certified Doomster
description:
A group of kids at school tried to summon a demon to help cheat on their math test, but accidentally awoke an eldritch god. Now one of them is trying to “merge with it?” It’s up to you, a shut-in nerd who apparently is the only one with any sense around here, to gather together some friends to put a stop to the coming apocalypse. Fight monsters, build your party, and try not to succumb to the madness the world around you is filled with in... Certified Doomster.

--CREDITS--
Programming: Ryan Hunt, James "Air Man" Lillicrap
Art: Michael Willner, Maxwell Lico, Ivy Wallingford
Story: James "Air Man" Lillicrap, Michael Willner, Lucas Hamson
SFX/Music: James "Air Man" Lillicrap

Special Thanks:
Griffin Willner for trailer VA
Nick Mangiameli for trailer VA submission
Ernest Lillicrap for trailer VA submission
Rachel Lynch for Disposal Demon Sprite
Kieran Dwyer for Game Design Suggestions/Dialogue
Alex Ziolkowski for Creative Design and Locker Lurker Sprite

(A game made in less than 4 months)
